name: @react-static/plugin-logging
description: Plugin for React Static 8+ projects: adds logging to the hooks of the React Static eco-system.
author: Derk-Jan Karrenbeld <derk-jan@xpbytes.com>

scripts.build: yarn build:incremental --delete-dir-on-start && yarn build:declarations && cp package.json dist/
scripts.build:incremental: cross-env BABEL_ENV=build yarn babel src --out-dir dist --source-maps --extensions .ts,.tsx --root-mode upward --no-comments
